title: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit Talks Eurozone and Emerging Markets with CNBC Closing Bell
summary: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit was interviewed this afternoon on CNBC's Closing Bell, where he discussed capital and liquidity, emerging markets, the Eurozone, Citi's 200th Anniversary and more.
tag-1: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit Talks Eurozone and Emerging Markets with CNBC Closing Bell
